Here are eight tips to help you rebuild your routines and get on with your life
ONE
Keep what you know works.
It can be tempting to start with a blank slate.
but the less you change,
the quicker you'll adjust to those changes.
So anything you liked from your old routine
that would still work with the new one, consider keeping

and can run a 5k between making breakfast for their family and going to work.

How much alone time do you need?

give yourself extra time between your new routines in case one takes longer than you expect
